title: Sequential proton coupled electron transfers from a tetraruthenium polyoxometalate in photochemical water oxidation
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00146J, Paper

Elena Rossin, Marcella Bonchio, Mirco Natali, Andrea Sartorel
The tetraruthenium polyoxometalate {RuIV(H2O)4(μ-OH)2(μ-O)4[SiW10O36]2} (Ru4POM) shows multiple oxidative proton coupled electron transfer (PCET) events in a [Ru(bpy)3]2+ / S2O82- photochemical cycle for catalytic water oxidation, with electrons conveyed to the...
